name: TextSpan
title: Google
Cloud
Language
Annotation
TextSpan
description: Represents a piece of text including relative location.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/language"

language = Google::Cloud::Language.new

content = "I love dogs. I hate cats."
document = language.document content
annotation = document.annotate

sentence = annotation.sentences.last
text_span = sentence.text_span
text_span.text #=> "I hate cats."
text_span.offset #=> 13

title: Google

TextSpan#offset
methods.description: The API calculates the beginning offset of the content in the original document according to the encoding specified in the API request.
